page.title: 04HOBBIES
page.content: Gardening is probably the most popular hobby; the Annual WI flower show is well patronised and is one of the events of the Village year. Two keen amateur orchid growers live in the village one of them the Patron of the Devon Orchid Society and the other a committee member and judge. All the other country pursuits are widely practised including walking, horse-riding, bird-watching and rough and clay-pigeon shooting. One or two people still keep ferrets and use them. Skittles and darts are popular, but people have to go to Honiton to find a team. The village also seems to have more than its share of artists. The football club has lapsed due to the reduction in the appropriate age group over the last twenty years.
